title: How do I turn on debug for my pixel 3xl
content:
Hello, I am trying to use android auto and using the USB c to connect my phone to my Audi..but when I try to connect it , it fails because it says I need to turn on usb debug. How do I do this for my pixel 3XL

Thank you

Roberto
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
